titleStmt.title: By the King whereas, out of our owne obseruance in the late reigne of our most deare and royal father, we saw much disorder in and about his houshold ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiesty,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at White-Hall, the sixe and tvventieth day of May, in the first yeere of Our Raigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiesty
